MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G44 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:22pm. Our engineers have arrived at the Monreith substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:30pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:35pm on Friday, 16 April 2021
